c74object.digest: Liquids: Single, spherical air bubble model.
c74object.description: Air bubble model. sdt.bubble~ takes two control parameters: bubble radius in mm [0.15, 150.0], and rise factor [0.0., 3.0].

method.description: Inlet 0: Bang triggers a bubble event.
